background.script:
on unitSelectedPropertyChange if unitSelected of the target is true then set the lineWidth of the target to 2 else set the lineWidth of the target to 0 end if end unitSelectedPropertyChange
on mouseDown buttonNumber,firstModifier if the target has property unitSelected then if firstModifier is not shift then repeat with x = 1 to number of card buttons set the unitSelected of card button x to false end repeat set the unitSelected of the target to true else set the unitSelected of the target to (not the unitSelected of the target) end if else show bg grc "selectionRectangle" repeat with x = 1 to number of card buttons set the unitSelected of card button x to false end repeat repeat while the mouse is down end repeat hide bg grc "selectionRectangle" end if end mouseDown
